name: Anchor
description: Allows a ship to land and stay afloat without a Helmsman powering it.

name: Arcane Amplifier
description: Allows spellcasters to amplify offensive evocation spells to mega scale.

name: Arcane Font
description: Gathers residual magical energy to cast the Automatic Helm spell once per day.

name: Astrolabe
description: Generates an illusory representation of celestial bodies within a crystal sphere.

name: Brig
description: A secure room for containing up to 5 medium creatures.

name: Chameleon Orb
description: Generates an illusion of the surrounding landscape to hide the ship when landed.

name: Fighter Bay
description: Stores one fighter-sized ship for use by a Fighter Helmsman.

name: Invisibility Amplifier
description: Amplifies the Invisibility spell to mega scale, affecting the entire ship.

name: Jettison
description: Releases debris behind the ship, functioning as a physical version of the Jettison spell.

name: Lifeboats
description: Specialized pods that can carry crew members to safety.

name: Passage Device
description: Allows the Helmsman to cast the Create Portal spell once per day.

name: Plane Shift Amplifier
description: Amplifies the Plane Shift spell to affect the entire ship.

name: Portal Locator
description: Casts the Locate Portal spell for the Helmsman.

name: Sending Chamber
description: Allows long-distance communication between ships with Sending Chambers.

name: Sick Bay
description: Provides medical care and healing for the crew.

name: Workshop
description: Provides tools and space for artisans to work on projects during travel.
